TopicTitle: Stock Aeris-K2 Defaults to Launching from Pad instead of a Runway

Articles.Content:
Version 0.1.0.0.20892, Win11, Ryzen 9 3900X, Radeon RX 5700, 32 GB

When opening the Aeris-K2 workspace that's built-in, the launch location is set to a launchpad instead of a runway. This is extremely minor and it's pretty funny when you launch it and realize it inadvertently got sent to a pad, but I thought I'd mention it for completeness' sake.
